title: VistaGen Therapeutics to Present at Credit Suisse 27th Annual Healthcare Conference on Wednesday, November 14, 2018

VistaGen Therapeutics Acquires Worldwide Rights to Develop and Commercialize PH10, a First-in-Class Intranasally Administered Neuroactive Steroid with Rapid-onset Antidepressant Effects for Major Depressive Disorder Demonstrated in Phase 2a Study
